alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CHESTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rock Hill to 8 miles northeast of Chester to 15 miles southwest of York. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Rock Hill, Great Falls, Fort Lawn, Richburg, Lowrys, Blackstock, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Chester State Park, and Edgemoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
